title: Diplomacy
explanation: Each empire can set diplomatic relations to each other, the lowest value is the effective relation. 0 = hostile, 1 = neutral (default), 2 = allied.

modal.headline: Diplomatic relations to empire [{ticker}] {name}
modal.changePending: Our diplomatic relations to [{ticker}] will change in {turns} turns to {status}.

change.headline: Change diplomatic relation
change.explanation: Changing the diplomatic relation to this empire takes {num} turns to take effect. Please not that the lower value between the two empires is still the effective relation.
